name: Edge
tagline: Repo and Wiki for documentation and help for various components of The Edge lab
body:
### Welcome Innovation @ The EDGE

The EDGE is a space where we invite the OU community to join us in experiencing and exploring new technologies.

Our three core technologies at launch are:

### Immersive Head-mounted Virtual Reality Goggles
MC & JA please write a blurb

[WORKSHOP SIGNUP BUTTON]

### 3D Printing
With a good understanding of 3D printing you can create 3D objects that meet many different needs. From cell phone cases to name-tags and custom brackets or enclosures for electronics, your imagination is really the only limit to what you can create. Come join us at one of our workshops.

[WORKSHOP SIGNUP BUTTON]

### Microcontroller electronics

[WORKSHOP SIGNUP BUTTON]
